===Glyph origin===
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|目|t1=eye|儿|t2=human}} – an eye on a pair of legs. Originally a human figure with a large eye for a head.

From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*ken ~ m-kjen}}.
